boundary

Class UIAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • boundary.UIAdmin

  • public class UIAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the user interface for the admin i.e. the cinema staff. It allows the admin to logon, access & edit movie data, access & edit session data, add holidays & change the admin password.
    Author:
    SuyashL

      • displayShowtimeByMovieID

        public int displayShowtimeByMovieID(int movieID)
        The following method searches through all the sessions and gets the sessions for a particular movie.
        Parameters:
        movieID - Movie ID to be searched for.
        Returns:
        ret - Flag whether any sessions were found.

      • displayShowtimeByCinemaID

        public int displayShowtimeByCinemaID(int cinemaID,
                                     MovieController MC)
        The following method searches through all the sessions and gets the sessions for a particular cinema.
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - Cinema ID to be searched for.
        MC - MovieController object to use in search.
        Returns:
        ret - Flag whether any sessions were found.

      • displayShowtimeByDate

        public int displayShowtimeByDate(java.lang.String date,
                                 MovieController MC)
        The following method searches through all the sessions and gets the sessions on a particular date.
        Parameters:
        date - Date to be searched for.
        MC - MovieController object to use in search.
        Returns:
        ret - Flag whether any sessions were found.
